title: Atakkâ you!
overview: Atakkâ you! is the story of ambitious and energetic thirteen year-old junior high schoolgirl You Hazuki, who moves to Tokyo from the Japanese countryside to live with her father Toshihiko, a cameraman recently returned from Peru, and attend school. You, who has exceptional jumping abilities, is passionate about volleyball and dreams of one day being a part of Japan's national women's volleyball team in the 1988 Seoul Olympics.
